name: Meklord Emperor Granel ∞
text: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Grand Core", this card gains ATK/DEF equal to half of your LP. Cannot be targeted by an opponent's card effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card (max. 1). This card gains ATK equal to the ATK of the monster equipped to it by this effect. You can only control 1 "Meklord Emperor" monster.
